metadata.title: CVE-2021-3753 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A race problem was seen in the vt_k_ioctl in drivers/tty/vt/vt_ioctl.c inthe Linux kernel, which may cause an out of bounds read in vt as the writeaccess to vc_mode is not protected by lock-in vt_ioctl (KDSETMDE). Thehighest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
